She has hypertension, hype   rlipidemia, and gastroesophageal reflux diseas e. She has smoked one pack of cigarettes daily for 37 years. Current medications include aspirin, atorvas   tati  n, ramipril, metoprolol, and esomeprazole. She    is 178 cm (5 ft 10 in) tall and weighs 89   kg (207 lbs); BMI is 29.7 kg/m2. There is a nontender skin  lesion near the right large toen   ail. A photogr  aph of the lesion is shown. The remainder of the    examination shows no abnormalities.
